name: Sacred Stones
description: Retro sidescrolling action and adventure greet you in Sacred Stones! The indie atmosphere is easy to immerse yourself in. Have a great time as you explore, run/jump & fight your way to victory. This game is perfect for both hardcore and casual fans alike seeking that nostalgic-indie fix!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or later Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
